name: .VXML File Extension
summary: Learn about .VXML files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Text file containing code written in VoiceXML, an XML based language used for vocal interaction between a human and computer; typically contains speech recognition and speech synthesis functions that allow a computer to interact with a human via voice commands.

content: VoiceXML is commonly used to process voice commands received by users via telephone. Examples include selecting menu options, acquiring driving directions, and tracking orders through an automated voice recognition system.
The W3C (World Wide Web Consortium) supports VoiceXML as a Web standard. The first draft of VoiceXML 3.0 was established in November 2008.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
